jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for an experienced and skilled Senior SEO Specialist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in developing and implementing effective SEO strategies. As a Senior SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for optimizing our online content, driving organic traffic, and improving our search engine rankings.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Comprehend client requirements and ensure their contentment by achieving set targets.
responsibilities.audits: Conduct pre-pitch audits to assess the existing state and structure of websites and pages.
responsibilities.analytics: Monitor and assess web analytics dashboards, reporting on trends and highlights.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Execute SEO strategies promptly to meet client business targets while maintaining work quality.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Establish backlinks from influencers and bloggers.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Optimize website content both on-page and off-page.
responsibilities.siteTrafficManagement: Ensure a minimum level of site traffic monthly.
responsibilities.bounceRateAndTimeSpent: Minimize bounce rate and maximize average time spent on the site.
responsibilities.seoContentCreation: Provide guidance to the content team on SEO content creation. Review content for accuracy in terms of usability, content, and design.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

skills.skill2: Proficient use of web analytics tools.
skills.skill4: Knowledge of on-page and off-page optimization techniques.
skills.skill5: Ability to meet business targets while upholding quality standards.
skills.skill6: Familiarity with SEO content creation and review.

jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our team at iSearch India, a leading digital marketing company. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying business opportunities, building client relationships, and driving growth in both international and domestic markets.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Develop and implement strategic business development plans to expand the company's presence in international and domestic markets.
responsibilities.audits: Identify and pursue new business opportunities through market research and analysis.
responsibilities.analytics: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Collaborate with internal teams to ensure the successful delivery of services and exceed client expectations.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Prepare and deliver compelling presentations to potential clients.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Negotiate and close business deals, ensuring mutually beneficial agreements.
responsibilities.siteTrafficManagement: Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
qualifications.experience1: Proven experience in business development, sales, or a related role
qualifications.experience2: Strong understanding of the digital marketing industry and its trends.
qualifications.experience4: Ability to build and maintain effective relationships with clients and team members.
qualifications.experience5: Results-oriented with a track record of meeting or exceeding targets.

skills.skill6: Knowledge of digital marketing trends and services.

jobs.jobTitle: Lead Generation Specialist - International and Domestic Market
jobs.jobDescription: iSearch India, a leading digital marketing company, is seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Lead Generation Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for generating high-quality leads for both international and domestic markets. As a key member of our team, you will play a crucial role in driving business growth and expanding our client base.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industries for lead generation.
responsibilities.audits: Develop and implement effective lead generation strategies to meet business objectives.
responsibilities.analytics: Utilize digital marketing tools, social media platforms, and other channels to generate leads.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to create targeted campaigns.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Analyze and report on the performance of lead generation activities, making data-driven recommendations for improvement.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Build and maintain relationships with potential clients through effective communication.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
qualifications.experience1: Proven experience as a Lead Generation Specialist or in a similar role.
qualifications.experience2: Knowledge of digital marketing strategies and tools.
qualifications.experience3: Familiarity with international and domestic markets.
qualifications.experience6: Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

skills.skill2: Proficient in digital marketing tools and platforms.
skills.skill3: Strong data analysis and reporting skills.

jobs.jobTitle: Head - Sales & Marketing - International and Domestic Market
jobs.jobDescription: iSearch India, a leading digital marketing company, is seeking a dynamic and experienced professional to join our team as the Head of Sales & Marketing. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing strategic plans to drive sales and revenue growth in both international and domestic markets.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Develop and implement comprehensive sales and marketing strategies to achieve business objectives.
responsibilities.audits: Lead and manage the sales and marketing teams, providing guidance, support, and performance feedback.
responsibilities.analytics: Identify and capitalize on market trends, opportunities, and competitive advantages.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, partners, and key stakeholders.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Oversee the development of marketing collateral, campaigns, and promotional activities.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Analyze sales and marketing data to track performance and optimize strategies.
responsibilities.siteTrafficManagement: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives.
responsibilities.bounceRateAndTimeSpent: Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices.
responsibilities.seoContentCreation: Prepare and present regular reports on sales and marketing performance to the executive team.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. MBA is a plus.
qualifications.experience1: Proven track record of success in sales and marketing leadership roles.
qualifications.experience2: Demonstrated experience in developing and executing successful sales strategies.
qualifications.experience3: Strong understanding of both international and domestic markets
qualifications.experience5: Ability to lead and motivate a high-performing team.
qualifications.experience6: Strategic thinking with a results-oriented mindset.
qualifications.experience7: Experience in the digital marketing industry is highly desirable.

skills.skill7: Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM software.

jobs.jobDescription: iSearch India is seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our dynamic team. As a Business Analyst, you will play a crucial role in analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing solutions to enhance operational efficiency. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in business analysis, a strong analytical mindset, and excellent communication skills.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Conduct thorough analysis of business processes, systems, and data.
responsibilities.audits: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and document business requirements.
responsibilities.analytics: Develop and maintain detailed documentation of business processes, workflows, and user manuals.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Identify areas for improvement in existing processes and recommend solutions.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Work closely with stakeholders to prioritize business requirements and ensure successful project delivery.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Analyze and interpret data to provide valuable insights and support decision-making.
responsibilities.siteTrafficManagement: Collaborate with the development team to ensure that technical solutions align with business requirements.
responsibilities.bounceRateAndTimeSpent: Provide training and support to end-users to ensure successful implementation of new processes or systems.
responsibilities.seoContentCreation: Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to drive continuous improvement.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field.

qualifications.experience4: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

skills.skill7: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and business analysis tools.

jobs.jobDescription: As a Demand Executive at iSearch India, you will play a crucial role in driving business growth through effective demand generation strategies. You will be responsible for creating and implementing campaigns to generate leads, nurturing prospects, and contributing to the overall sales pipeline.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Develop and execute demand generation strategies to drive qualified leads for the sales team.
responsibilities.audits: Collaborate with the marketing team to create and optimize campaigns across various channels, including digital advertising, email marketing, and social media.
responsibilities.analytics: Identify and target key customer segments through data-driven approaches.
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Analyze and report on the performance of demand generation campaigns, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Work closely with the sales team to ensure seamless handover of qualified leads and support in achieving revenue targets.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Stay informed about industry trends and competitor activities to refine demand generation strategies.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking a talented Content Writer to join our dynamic team at iSearch India, a leading digital marketing company based in Kharadi, Pune. As a Content Writer, you will be responsible for creating engaging and relevant content that aligns with our clients' digital marketing strategies.

responsibilities.clientSatisfaction: Research, write, and edit content for various digital platforms, including websites, blogs, social media, and email campaigns.
responsibilities.audits: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content that supports the overall marketing strategy.
responsibilities.analytics: Conduct keyword research and optimize content for search engines (SEO).
responsibilities.seoStrategyExecution: Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate them into the content strategy.
responsibilities.buildingBacklinks: Proofread and edit content to ensure it meets high-quality standards.
responsibilities.onPageOffPageOptimization: Work closely with clients to understand their brand voice and incorporate it into the content.

teamRelated.developingRelationships: Actively contribute to team goals for collaborative departmental success.

qualifications.experience: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, or a related field.
qualifications.experience1: Proven experience as a Content Writer or in a similar role.
qualifications.experience2: Portfolio of published articles or content pieces.
qualifications.experience3: Excellent writing and editing skills with a keen eye for detail.
qualifications.experience4: Strong research skills and the ability to understand complex topics.
qualifications.experience6: Ability to meet deadlines and work in a fast-paced environment.
qualifications.experience7: Creative thinking and the ability to generate innovative ideas.

skills.skill1: Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
skills.skill2: Proficiency in using content management systems (CMS) and other relevant tools.
skills.skill3: Basic understanding of digital marketing concepts.
